abstract.p: Decision making can be understood as collecting information or evidence, for or against options up to a threshold. Good decision-making strategies adjust evidence-gathering to the person and context of a decision. Business coaching can strengthen the decision-making competencies in this adjustment process. Article Language German Publication This article has been initially released in volume 02-2023 of the Journal BSO (Berufsverband für Coaching, Supervision und Organisationsberatung).
